attributes.action: To turn around the decision to ban XL bullies from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: If you need to be more strict on idiots that own these dogs fair enough but do not play God and blame the breed it’s like we are moving back into discrimination days again it is so wrong !!
attributes.background: To stop the lunacy decision to ban a breed for a select few incidents that bad owners have caused, it is disgusting science will show that any dog can be turned nasty in the wrong hands

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
